title: 71: Alex's Attorney Accuses AG's Office of Withholding Evidence & New Player in Alex Drug Accusations
description:
Alex Murdaugh's attorney, Dick Harpootlian, holds a press conference claiming the prosecution hasn't turned over the evidence against Alex in a timely manner. He also accuses the district attorney's office of leaking information to the press.
Cousin Eddie attends a hearing to decide if his bond should be revoked.
A new character enters the saga, and could be involved in the drug enterprise Alex and Cousin Eddie have allegedly been involved in.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
